org.dspace.services.caching
Class CachingServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.dspace.services.caching.CachingServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.dspace.kernel.mixins.ConfigChangeListener, org.dspace.kernel.mixins.InitializedService, org.dspace.kernel.mixins.ServiceChangeListener, org.dspace.kernel.mixins.ShutdownService, org.dspace.services.CachingService
public final class CachingServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.dspace.services.CachingService, org.dspace.kernel.mixins.InitializedService, org.dspace.kernel.mixins.ShutdownService, org.dspace.kernel.mixins.ConfigChangeListener, org.dspace.kernel.mixins.ServiceChangeListener

Implementation of the core caching service, which is available for anyone who is writing code for DSpace to use.

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski @ gmail.com)

getAllEhCaches

protected java.util.List<net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache> getAllEhCaches(boolean sorted)
Return all caches from the CacheManager.

Parameters:

Returns:
the list of all known ehcaches

instantiateEhCache

protected EhcacheCache instantiateEhCache(java.lang.String cacheName,
                                          org.dspace.services.model.CacheConfig cacheConfig)
Create an EhcacheCache (and the associated EhCache) using the supplied name (with default settings), or get the cache out of Spring or the current configured cache.

This expects that the cacheRecord has already been checked and will not check it again.

Will proceed in this order:

  1. Attempt to load a bean with the name of the cache
  2. Attempt to load cache from caching system
  3. Create a new cache by this name
  4. Put the cache in the cache record

Parameters:
cacheName - the name of the cache
cacheConfig - the config for this cache
Returns:
a cache instance

instantiateMapCache

protected MapCache instantiateMapCache(java.lang.String cacheName,
                                       org.dspace.services.model.CacheConfig cacheConfig)
Create a thread map cache using the supplied name with supplied settings.

This expects that the cacheRecord has already been checked and will not check it again. It also places the cache into the request map.

Parameters:
cacheName - the name of the cache
cacheConfig - the config for this cache
Returns:
a cache instance

generateCacheStats

protected static java.lang.String generateCacheStats(net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache cache)
Generate some stats for this cache. Note that this is not cheap so do not use it very often.

Parameters:
cache - an Ehcache
Returns:
the stats of this cache as a string
